Title: Farmworkers, Farm, Ranch, and Aquacultural Animals
Description: Attend to live farm, ranch, open range or aquacultural animals that may include cattle, sheep, swine, goats, horses and other equines, poultry, rabbits, finfish, shellfish, and bees. May clean and maintain animal housing areas. Includes workers who shear wool from sheep and collect eggs in hatcheries.
